text: (ai rasool) tum kah do ki mai khud apana aap to ekhatiyaar rakhata hee nahin na naphe qa na zarar ka magar bas vahee khuda jo chaahe aur agar (bagair khuda ke batae) gaib ko jaanata hota to yaqeenan mai apana bahut sa faayada kar leta aur mujhe kabhee koee takaleef bhee na pahunchatee mai to sirph eemaanadaaron ko (azaab se daraane vaala) aur vehashat kee khushakhabaree dene vaala han
